headline.main: 1,500 ATTEND DANCE TO AID WAR RELIEF; Sir Gerald and Lady Campbell Among Honor Guests at Fete for British Children

lead_paragraph: A gala "Downtown Hop," presented under the auspices of the Downtown Committee of the British War Relief Society, took place last night in the grand ballroom of the Hotel Astor, drawing an attendance of more than 1,500 persons.
abstract: soc Downtown Com benefit ball, N Y C
snippet: A gala "Downtown Hop," presented under the auspices of the Downtown Committee of the British War Relief Society, took place last night in the grand ballroom of the Hotel Astor, drawing an attendance of more than 1,500 persons....
